description: The registration_number determines the license_plate. The same registration number must always map to the same license plate.
The registration_number determines the country_code. A given registration number must always be associated with the same country code.
The combination of license_plate and country_code determines the vehicle_id. The same plate within the same country must always refer to the same vehicle.
The vehicle_id determines the registration_number. Each vehicle identifier must always map back to the same registration number.
The vehicle_id must not be unique. The count of distinct vehicle_id values must be strictly less than the total number of records to ensure redundancy for FD testing.
